detaileddescription.para: Normal Mode: Bit clock runs at 1/4 of fast clock
Fast Mode: Bit clock runs at same as fast clock
Provides the options to select bit clock mode.
Default passive level of the channel is low
Default passive level of the channel is high
Provides the options to select passive level of the channel output
Disable: Brightness = Dimming Level * Intensity
Enable: Brightness = Intensity
Provides the options to bypass dimming engine
Global Dimming Engine
Dimming Engine 0
Dimming Engine 1
Dimming Engine 2
Provides the options to select dimming source of the channel
Disable: No control over a sigma-delta modulator output
Enable: Limit consecutive zeros at sigma-delta modulator output
Provides the options to select flicker watchdog enable/disable
Disable: No control over a BCCU module output
Enable: External gating signal which controls BCCU module output
Provides the options to select gating functionality enable/disable, and be used for peak-current control
Trap on rising edge of the BCCU.TRAPL signal
Trap on falling edge of the BCCU.TRAPL signal
Provides the options to select edge for trap occurrence
Trap INA
Trap INB
Trap INC
Trap IND
Trap INE
Trap INF
Trap ING
Trap INH
Trap INI
Trap INJ
Trap INK
Trap INL
Trap INM
Trap INN
Trap INO
Trap INP
Provides the options to select source of trap input
Trigger on output transition from passive to active
Trigger on output transition from active to passive
Provides the options to select trigger edge
Trigger occurrence on BCCU_TRIGOUT0 signal
Trigger occurrence on BCCU_TRIGOUT1 signal
Provides the options to select trigger output, and only be used in XMC_BCCU_TRIGMODE1
Coarse curve: Slope of the linear pieces doubles every time, when it passes specific thresholds of 16, 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024, 2048
Fine Curve: More pieces and different line slopes
Provides the options to select exponential dimming curve
Trigger 0 Event flag status
Trigger 1 Event flag status
FIFO Full Event flag status
FIFO Empty Event flag status
Trap Event flag status (Without Trap Set)
Trap state flag status
Provides the options to know the status of the event flags. The members can be combined using 'OR' operator for multiple selection.
Trigger 0 event
Trigger 1 event
FIFO Full event
FIFO Empty event
Trap event
Provides the options to enable/disable the events. The members can be combined using 'OR' operator for multiple selection.
Operation completed successfully
Operation has some errors
Defines the status of BCCU driver, to verify the related API calls. Use type XMC_BCCU_STATUS_t for this enum.
Request ignored, and module cannot get suspended
All running channels gets stopped, and freeze into a last state (without safe stop)
All running channels gets stopped, and freeze into a last state (with safe stop)
Provides the options to select suspend mode
BCCU.TRAPL is Low
BCCU.TRAPL is High
Provides the options to know the current level of trap
BCCU module is not in a Trap State
BCCU module is in a Trap State
Provides the options to know the status of trap occurrence
Trap on rising edge of the BCCU.TRAPL signal
Trap on falling edge of the BCCU.TRAPL signal
Provides the options to select trap edge
BCCU trigger occurs on channel trigger(without delay)
BCCU trigger occurs on 1/4 bit time delayed after channel trigger
BCCU trigger occurs on 1/2 bit time delayed after channel trigger
Provides the options to select trigger delay, and only be used if Bit clock in Normal mode
Mode0: Trigger on Any Channel using OR logic
Mode1: Trigger on Active channel using round-robin
Provides the options to select trigger mode.
Redefinition of BCCU module channel structure; pointer to bccu module channel Base address
Redefinition of BCCU module dimming engine structure; pointer to bccu module dimming engine base address
Redefinition of BCCU module structure; pointer to bccu module base address

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Specific dimming engine number to stop dimming process Range: 0 to 2

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: When the dimming in progress, the outcome of executing the API is stopping the dimming (i.e. fading) immediately for specific dimming engine number dim_no by writing a register bit DESTRCON_DEyA.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Specific channel number to stop color change Range: 0 to 8

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: When the linear walk in progress, the outcome of executing the API is stopping the linear walk (i.e. color change) immediately for specific channels number using mask by writing a register CHSTRCON_CHyA.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..
Output transition selection. Use type XMC_BCCU_CH_TRIG_EDGE_t. Range: XMC_BCCU_CH_TRIG_EDGE_PASS_TO_ACT or XMC_BCCU_CH_TRIG_EDGE_ACT_TO_PASS
Forcing a trigger at output. Range: 0 or 1 Generates a trigger if modulator output do not change for 256 bclk cycles

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures global trigger settings: trigger edge, force trigger enable by writing a register CHCONFIG. And also configures force trigger enable, generates a trigger if modulator output do not change for 256 bclk cycles

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disables dimming engine bypass by clearing register bit CHCONFIG_DBP.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disables flicker watchdog by writing register bit CHCONFIG_WEN. No limits the sigma-delta modulator output according to Watchdog threshold

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disables gating feature by writing register bit CHCONFIG_GEN. The gating feature is used to enable/disable fast control schemes, such as peak-current control and this has been controlled by Analog Comparator module.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disables packer by clearing writing register bit CHCONFIG_PEN.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enables dimming engine bypass by writing register bit CHCONFIG_DBP.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enables flicker watchdog by writing register bit CHCONFIG_WEN. And limits the sigma-delta modulator output according to Watchdog threshold

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enables gating feature by writing register bit CHCONFIG_GEN. The gating feature is used to enable fast control schemes, such as peak-current control and this has been controlled by Analog Comparator module.

memberdef.argsstring: (XMC_BCCU_CH_t *const channel, uint32_t thresh, uint32_t off_comp, uint32_t on_comp)
memberdef.name: XMC_BCCU_CH_EnablePacker

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..
Packer threshold value of FIFO. It defines number of queue stages must be filled before output generator starts generating the pulses. Until that, only off-bits are generated at the output.
Packer off-time compare level. When the off-time counter reaches this, the measured on off time counters are stored into FIFO
Packer on-time compare level. When the on-time counter reaches this, the measured on & off time counters are stored into FIFO

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enables packer by writing register bit CHCONFIG_PEN. And also configures packer threshold, off and on compare levels by writing register PKCMP. The main purpose of the packer is to decrease the average rate of switching of the output signal, to decrease the load on external switching circuits and improve EMC behavior

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..
Pointer to constant bccu channel configuration data structure. Use type XMC_BCCU_CH_CONFIG_t.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures dimming engine source, dimming bypass selection, channel trigger edge, flicker watchdog selection and force trigger selection by using dim_sel, dim_bypass, trig_edge, flick_wd_en, force_trig_en by writing into a CHCONFIG register. And also configures packer settings: threshold, off and on compare levels, initial values of off & on counters, by writing into a CHCONFIG, PKCMP and PKCNTR registers.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves current channel intensity by reading the register INT.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..

simplesect.para: Packer off-time compare level. When the off-time counter reaches this, the measured on & off time counters are stored into FIFO

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves packer off compare level by reading the register bit PKCMP_OFFCMP.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..

simplesect.para: Packer on-time compare level. When the on-time counter reaches this, the measured on & off time counters are stored into FIFO

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves packer on compare level by reading the register bit PKCMP_ONCMP.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves packer threshold value by reading the register bit CHCONFIG_PKTH.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..
Selects a dimming engine source of the channel. Use type XMC_BCCU_CH_DIMMING_SOURCE_t

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures dimming engine source by writing register bit CHCONFIG_DSEL

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..
Prescaler factor. Range: 0 to 1023

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: configure the linear walker clock prescaler factor by writing register bit CHCONFIG_LINPRES.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..
Packer off-time compare level. When the off-time counter reaches this, the measured on & off time counters are stored into FIFO

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures packer off compare level by writing register bit PKCMP_OFFCMP

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..
Configures an initial packer off-time counter level, only if channel is disabled. Controls phase shift of the modulator output

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures packer initial off counter value by writing register bit PKCNTR_OFFCNTVAL Note: Shall only be called if channel disabled.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..
Packer on-time compare level. When the on-time counter reaches this, the measured on & off time counters are stored into FIFO

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures packer on compare level by writing register bit PKCMP_ONCMP

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..
Configures an initial packer on-time counter level, only if channel is disabled. Controls phase shift of the modulator output

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures packer initial on counter value by writing register bit PKCNTR_ONCNTVAL Note: Shall only be called if channel disabled.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..
Packer threshold value of FIFO

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures packer threshold by writing register bit CHCONFIG_PKTH

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu channel. Range: BCCU0_CH0, BCCU0_CH1..
Target channel intensity. Range: 0 to 4095

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures target channel intensity by writing register INTS, only be written if no shadow transfer of linear walk. Use XMC_BCCU_IsLinearWalkComplete() to know shadow transfer finished

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

event flag mask to clear multiple events at a time using ORed values of XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_t. For example: If XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_TRIGGER0, XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_TRIGGER1, XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_FIFOEMPTY wants to clear at a same time, then event mask is = (XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_TRIGGER0 | XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_TRIGGER1 | XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_FIFOEMPTY)

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Clears multiple interrupt event flags at a same time using ORed values of XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_t by writing a register EVFSR.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

Dimming engine mask to abort a dimming for multiple dimming engines at a same time. For example: If dimming engine 0, channel 2 wants to abort a dimming at a same time, then dimming engine mask is 0101 = 0x03 ----------------------- | DE2 | DE1 | DE0 | -----------------------

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: When the dimming in progress, the outcome of executing the API is stopping the dimming (i.e. fading) immediately for specific dimming engine number dim_no by writing a register DESTRCON.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

Channel mask to stop a linear walk for multiple channels at a same time. For example: If channel 0, channel 7, channel 1 wants to abort a linear walk at a same time, then channel mask is 01000 0011 = 0x83 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | Chan8 | Chan7 | Chan6 | Chan5 | Chan4 | Chan3 | Chan2 | Chan1 | Chan0 | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: When the linear walk in progress, the outcome of executing the API is stopping the linear walk (i.e. color change) immediately for multiple channels at a same time using mask by writing a register CHSTRCON.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Pointer to a trigger configuration data structure. Use type XMC_BCCU_TRIG_CONFIG_t.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures global trigger settings: trigger mode, trigger delay, individual trigger lines and channel mask by writing a registers GLOBCON and CHTRIG. Trigger mode decides when to generate a BCCU trigger, trigger delay postpones the channel trigger by 1/4, or 1/2 bclk cycles

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disables multiple channels at a same time using mask by writing a register CHEN.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

Dimming engine mask to disable multiple dimming engine at a same time. For example: If dimming engine 0, channel 2 wants to disable a dimming at a same time, then dimming engine mask is 0101 = 0x03 ----------------------- | DE2 | DE1 | DE0 | -----------------------

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disables multiple dimming engines at a same time using mask by writing a register DEEN.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

Channel mask to disable multiple channels trap functionality. For example: If channel 0, channel 7, channel 1 wants to disable a trap functionality at a same time, then channel mask is 01000 0011 = 0x83 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | Chan8 | Chan7 | Chan6 | Chan5 | Chan4 | Chan3 | Chan2 | Chan1 | Chan0 | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disables multiple channels trap functionality at the same time using mask by writing a register bit CHOCON_CHyTPE.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enables multiple channels at a same time using mask by writing a register CHEN.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

Dimming engine mask to enable multiple dimming engine at a same time. For example: If dimming engine 0, channel 2 wants to enable a dimming at a same time, then dimming engine mask is 0101 = 0x03 ----------------------- | DE2 | DE1 | DE0 | -----------------------

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enables multiple dimming engines at a same time using mask by writing a register DEEN.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

Channel mask to enable multiple channels trap functionality. For example: If channel 0, channel 7, channel 1 wants to enable a trap functionality at a same time, then channel mask is 01000 0011 = 0x83 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | Chan8 | Chan7 | Chan6 | Chan5 | Chan4 | Chan3 | Chan2 | Chan1 | Chan0 | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enables multiple channels trap functionality at the same time using mask by writing a register bit CHOCON_CHyTPE.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Passive level selection. Use type XMC_BCCU_CH_ACTIVE_LEVEL_t. Range: XMC_BCCU_CH_ACTIVE_LEVEL_HIGH or XMC_BCCU_CH_ACTIVE_LEVEL_LOW

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures passive levels of multiple channels at a same time using mask by writing a register bit CHOCON_CHyOP.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

Dimming engine mask to start a dimming for multiple dimming engines at a same time. For example: If dimming engine 0, channel 2 wants to start a dimming at a same time, then dimming engine mask is 0101 = 0x03 ----------------------- | DE2 | DE1 | DE0 | -----------------------

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: After dimming engine initialization, the outcome of executing the API starts changing the brightness towards to target for multiple dimming engines at a same time using mask by writing a register DESTRCON.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

Channel mask to start a linear walk for multiple channels at a same time. For example: If channel 0, channel 7, channel 1 wants to start a linear walk at a same time, then channel mask is 01000 0011 = 0x83 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | Chan8 | Chan7 | Chan6 | Chan5 | Chan4 | Chan3 | Chan2 | Chan1 | Chan0 | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: After channel initialization, the outcome of executing the API starts changing the color smoothly towards to target for multiple channels at a same time using mask by writing a register CHSTRCON.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

Trigger mode selection. Range: XMC_BCCU_TRIGMODE0, XMC_BCCU_TRIGMODE1.
XMC_BCCU_TRIGMODE0 - Trigger on Any Channel
XMC_BCCU_TRIGMODE1 - Trigger on Active channel
Delay to avoid sampling during switching noise. Use type XMC_BCCU_TRIGDELAY_t. Range: XMC_BCCU_NO_DELAY, XMC_BCCU_QUARTER_BIT_DELAY, XMC_BCCU_HALF_BIT_DELAY.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures trigger mode and trigger delay by writing register bits GLOBCON.TM, GLOBCON.TRDEL. mode and delay parameters which decides when to trigger a conversion of vadc module for voltage measurement.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_BCCU_EnableChannelTrigger(), XMC_BCCU_ReadGlobalTrigger(), XMC_BCCU_ConcurrentConfigTrigger(), XMC_BCCU_GlobalInit(), XMC_BCCU_ReadLastTrigChanNr(), XMC_BCCU_GetChannelOutputLvlAtLastTrigger(), XMC_BCCU_CH_ConfigTrigger()

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Suspend mode selection. Use type XMC_BCCU_SUSPEND_MODE_t. Range: XMC_BCCU_SUSPEND_MODE_IGNORE, XMC_BCCU_SUSPEND_MODE_FREEZE, XMC_BCCU_USPEND_MODE_SAFE_FREEZE.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures suspend mode by writing register bit GLOBCON_SUSCFG.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu dimming engine. Range: BCCU0_DE0, BCCU0_DE1, BCCU0_DE2
Dither enable. Dithering added for every dimming step if dimming level < 128.
Type of exponential curve. Use type XMC_BCCU_DIM_CURVE_t. Note: If dither enabled, the configuration is being ignored

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures dimming clock curve by writing register bit DE_DTT_CSEL.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu dimming engine. Range: BCCU0_DE0, BCCU0_DE1, BCCU0_DE2

simplesect.para: Type of exponential curve Range: XMC_BCCU_DIM_CURVE_COARSE or XMC_BCCU_DIM_CURVE_FINE

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves exponential curve type by reading the register bit BCCU_DE_DTT_CSEL.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu dimming engine. Range: BCCU0_DE0, BCCU0_DE1, BCCU0_DE2
Pointer to constant dimming engine configuration data structure. Use type XMC_BCCU_DIM_CONFIG_t.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures dimming clock divider to adjust the fade rate, dither selection and exponential curve selection using dim_div, dither_en, cur_sel parameters and by writing into a DTT register.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu dimming engine. Range: BCCU0_DE0, BCCU0_DE1, BCCU0_DE2

simplesect.para: Dimming clock divider value. Range: 0 to 1023

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves dimming clock divider value by reading the register BCCU_DE_DTT_DIMDIV.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu dimming engine. Range: BCCU0_DE0, BCCU0_DE1, BCCU0_DE2

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves current dimming level by reading the register DE_DL_DLEV.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu dimming engine. Range: BCCU0_DE0, BCCU0_DE1, BCCU0_DE2
Dimming clock divider, used to adjust the fade rate. If 0, the dimming level as same as target dimming level on shadow transfer

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures dimming clock divider by writing register bit DE_DTT_DIMDIV.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu dimming engine. Range: BCCU0_DE0, BCCU0_DE1, BCCU0_DE2
Target dimming level. Range: 0 to 4095

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures target dimming level by writing register DLS, only be written if no shadow transfer of dimming. Use XMC_BCCU_IsDimmingFinished() to know shadow transfer finished

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Specific channel number to disable. Range: 0 to 8

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disables a specific channel number using chan_no by writing a register CHEN.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Channel number to trigger a specific channel. Range: 0 to 8

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disables specific channel trigger using chan_no by writing a register bit CHOCON_CHyTPE.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Specific dimming engine number to disable. Range: 0 to 2

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disables a specific dimming engine number using dim_no by clearing a register bit DEEN_EDEy.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

Event mask to disable multiple events at a time using ORed values of XMC_BCCU_EVENT_t. For example: If XMC_BCCU_EVENT_TRIGGER0, XMC_BCCU_EVENT_TRIGGER1, XMC_BCCU_EVENT_FIFOEMPTY wants to disable at a same time, then event mask is = (XMC_BCCU_EVENT_TRIGGER0 | XMC_BCCU_EVENT_TRIGGER1 | XMC_BCCU_EVENT_FIFOEMPTY)

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disables multiple interrupt events at a same time using ORed values of XMC_BCCU_EVENT_t by writing a register EVIER.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Channel number to disable specific channel trap functionality. Range: 0 to 8

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disables specific channel trap functionality using chan_no by writing a register bit CHOCON_CHyTPE.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Specific channel number to enable. Range: 0 to 8

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enables a specific channel number using chan_no by writing a register CHEN.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Channel number to trigger a specific channel. Range: 0 to 8
Trigger line number to trigger a vadc. Use type XMC_BCCU_CH_TRIGOUT_t. Range: XMC_BCCU_CH_TRIGOUT0 or XMC_BCCU_CH_TRIGOUT1

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enables specific channel trigger using chan_no by writing a register bit CHOCON_CHyTPE.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Specific dimming engine number to enable. Range: 0 to 2

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enables a specific dimming engine number using dim_no by writing a register bit DEEN_EDEy.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

Event mask to enable multiple events at a time using ORed values of XMC_BCCU_EVENT_t. For example: If XMC_BCCU_EVENT_TRIGGER0, XMC_BCCU_EVENT_TRIGGER1, XMC_BCCU_EVENT_FIFOEMPTY wants to enable at a same time, then event mask is = (XMC_BCCU_EVENT_TRIGGER0 | XMC_BCCU_EVENT_TRIGGER1 | XMC_BCCU_EVENT_FIFOEMPTY)

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enables multiple interrupt events at a same time using ORed values of XMC_BCCU_EVENT_t by writing a register EVIER.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Channel number to enable specific channel trap functionality. Range: 0 to 8

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enables specific channel trap functionality using chan_no by writing a register bit CHOCON_CHyTPE.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Specific channel number to get an output level on last trigger. Range: 0 to 8

simplesect.para: Trap channel output level. Range: 0 or 1

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves output level of specific channel number when last trigger occurred by reading the register bit LTCHOL_LTOLy.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Pointer to constant bccu global configuration data structure. Use type XMC_BCCU_GLOBAL_CONFIG_t.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Initializes three main clocks (fast clock, bit clock, dimmer clock) by using fclk_ps bclk_sel dclk_ps parameters and writing into a GLOBCLK register. And also configures a trigger mode, trigger delay, maximum 0's allowed at modulator output by writing into a GLOBCON register.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Specific dimming engine number to know the dimming status. Range: 0 to 2

simplesect.para: Dimming completion status. Range: 0-Completed or 1-start change towards the target

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves dimming completion status for specific dimming engine number using dim_no by reading the register bit DESTRCON_DEyS.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu dimming engine. Range: BCCU0_DE0, BCCU0_DE1, BCCU0_DE2

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves dither enable status by reading the register bit BCCU_DE_DTT_DTEN.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Channel number to know the linear walk completion status. Range: 0 to 8

simplesect.para: Linear walk completion status. Range: 0-Completed or 1-intensity start changing towards the target

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves linear walk completion status for specific channel using chan_no by reading the register bit CHSTRCON_CHyS.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

simplesect.para: Prescaler factor. Range: 0 or 1 0 - XMC_BCCU_BCLK_MODE_NORMAL 1 - XMC_BCCU_BCLK_MODE_FAST

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves modulator output (bit-time) clock prescaler factor of a BCCU module by reading the register bit GLOBCLK_BCS. Use XMC_BCCU_BCLK_MODE_t type to validate a returned value.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves dimmer clock prescaler factor of a BCCU module by reading the register bit GLOBCLK_DCLK_PS. The dim clock is derived from the bccu clock by prescaler factor. i.e. fdclk = fbccu_clk / prescaler factor.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

simplesect.para: Interrupt events flags at a same time using ORed values of XMC_BCCU_EVENT_t.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves interrupt event flags at the same time using ORed values of XMC_BCCU_EVENT_t by reading the register EVFR.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves fast clock prescaler factor of a BCCU module by reading the register bit GLOBCLK_FCLK_PS. The fast clock is derived from the bccu clock by prescaler factor i.e. fdclk = fbccu_clk / prescaler factor.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

simplesect.para: Number of consecutive zeroes at modulator output. Range: 0 to 4095

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves number of consecutive zeroes at modulator output (flicker watchdog number) by reading the register bit GLOBCON_WDMBN.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

simplesect.para: Source of Trigger mode. Range: 0 or 1 0 - Trigger mode 0 (Trigger on Any Channel) 1 - Trigger mode 1 (Trigger on Active Channel)

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves global trigger mode of the BCCU module by reading the register bit GLOBCON_TM. Use XMC_BCCU_TRIGMODE_t type to validate a returned value.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

simplesect.para: Last triggered channel number. Range: 0 to 8 0 - BCCU Channel 0 1 - BCCU Channel 1 and so on.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves last triggered channel number of a BCCU module by reading the register bit GLOBCON_LTRS.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

simplesect.para: Trap edge selection. Range: 0, 1, 2 0 - XMC_BCCU_SUSPEND_MODE_IGNORE 1 - XMC_BCCU_SUSPEND_MODE_FREEZE. 2 - XMC_BCCU_USPEND_MODE_SAFE_FREEZE.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves the state of suspend mode by reading the register bit GLOBCON_TRAPIS. Use XMC_BCCU_SUSPEND_MODE_t type to validate a returned value.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

simplesect.para: Trap edge selection. Range: 0 or 1 0 - XMC_BCCU_CH_TRAP_EDGE_RISING 1 - XMC_BCCU_CH_TRAP_EDGE_FALLING.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves trap edge by reading the register bit GLOBCON_TRAPED. Use XMC_BCCU_CH_TRAP_EDGE_t type to validate a returned value.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

simplesect.para: Source of trap input. Range: 0 to 15 0 - TRAPINA 1 - TRAPINB and so on.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Retrieves trap input of the channel by reading the register bit GLOBCON_TRAPIS. Use XMC_BCCU_CH_TRAP_IN_t type to validate a returned value.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Prescaler factor. Use type XMC_BCCU_BCLK_MODE_t. Range: XMC_BCCU_BCLK_MODE_NORMAL or XMC_BCCU_BCLK_MODE_FAST.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures modulator output (bit-time) clock prescaler factor of a BCCU module by writing register bit GLOBCLK_BCS.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Trap input selection. Use type XMC_BCCU_TRIGDELAY_t. Range: XMC_BCCU_TRIGDELAY_NO_DELAY, XMC_BCCU_TRIGDELAY_QUARTER_BIT, XMC_BCCU_TRIGDELAY_HALF_BIT.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Selects input of trap functionality by writing register bit GLOBCON_TRAPIS. The trap functionality is used to switch off the connected power devices when trap input becomes active.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Prescaler factor. Range: 0 to 4095.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures dimmer clock prescaler factor of a BCCU module by writing register bit GLOBCLK_DCLK_PS.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0

Event flag mask to configure multiple events at a time using ORed values of XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_t. For example: If XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_TRIGGER0, XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_TRIGGER1, XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_FIFOEMPTY wants to configure at a same time, then event mask is = (XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_TRIGGER0 | XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_TRIGGER1 | XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_FIFOEMPTY)

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures multiple interrupt event flags at a same time using ORed values of XMC_BCCU_EVENT_STATUS_t by writing a register EVFSR.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Prescaler factor. Range: 0 to 4095.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures trigger functionality clock prescaler factor of a BCCU module by writing register bit GLOBCLK_FCLK_PS.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Number of consecutive zeroes at modulator output. Range: 0 to 4095.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures number of consecutive zeroes allowed at modulator output (flicker watch-dog number) by writing register bit GLOBCON_WDMBN.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Dimming level of global dimming engine. Range: 0 to 4095

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures a global dimming level by writing a register GLOBDIM. This is useful only if global dimming engine selected. Otherwise the configuration is ignored.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Specific channel number to enable specific channel. Range: 0 to 8
Passive level selection. Use type XMC_BCCU_CH_ACTIVE_LEVEL_t. Range: XMC_BCCU_CH_ACTIVE_LEVEL_HIGH or XMC_BCCU_CH_ACTIVE_LEVEL_LOW

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures passive level of specific channel using chan_no by writing a register bit CHOCON_CHyOP.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Trap edge selection. Use type XMC_BCCU_CH_TRAP_EDGE_t. Range: XMC_BCCU_CH_TRAP_EDGE_RISING, XMC_BCCU_CH_TRAP_EDGE_FALLING.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Selects active edge which detects trap on TRAPL signal by writing register bit GLOBCON_TRAPED.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Specific dimming engine number to start dimming process Range: 0 to 2

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: After dimming engine initialization, the outcome of executing the API starts changing the brightness towards to target by writing a register bit DESTRCON_DEyS.

parameterdescription.para: Base address of the bccu module. Range: BCCU0
Specific channel number to start color change Range: 0 to 8

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: After channel initialization, the outcome of executing the API starts changing the color smoothly towards to target by writing a register bit CHSTRCON_CHyS.

briefdescription.para: Brightness and Color Control Unit (BCCU) driver for the XMC1 microcontroller family.

detaileddescription.para: The Brightness and Color Control Unit (BCCU) is a dimming control peripheral for LED lighting applications. The BCCU module can be used to control multiple LED channels. Every channel generates one-bit sigma-delta bit stream with a user adjustable 12-bit average value. The dimming engine changes the brightness gradually (exponential curve) to appear natural to the human eye. It supports color control by adjusting the relative intensity of selected channels using a linear walk scheme for smooth color changes. It also supports high-power multi-channel LED lamps by optionally packing the bitstream. The optional packer which decreases the average rate of output switching by enforcing a defined on-time. The BCCU module generates two trigger signals to the ADC (BCCU_TRIGOUT0 and BCCU_TRIGOU1) to start conversions in a synchronized manner. The module can also be used as a multi-channel digital-analog converter with low-pass filters on the outputs. The BCCU module supports 3 independent dimming engines, 9 independent channels, Trap functions and 2 ADC triggering modes.
The driver is divided into global control (BCCU), channel control (BCCU_CH) and dimming control (BCCU_DIM).

BCCU features:
Configuration structure XMC_BCCU_GLOBAL_CONFIG_t and initialization function XMC_BCCU_GlobalInit()
Allows configuring of clock settings (Fast clock, Bit clock and Dimming clock). XMC_BCCU_SetFastClockPrescaler(),
XMC_BCCU_SelectBitClock(), XMC_BCCU_SetDimClockPrescaler().
Allows configuring global trigger settings. XMC_BCCU_ConfigGlobalTrigger()
Allows enabling multiple channels together. XMC_BCCU_ConcurrentEnableChannels()
Allows enabling single channel. XMC_BCCU_EnableChannel()
Allows configuring global dimming level. XMC_BCCU_SetGlobalDimmingLevel()
Starts linear walk for multiple channels together. XMC_BCCU_ConcurrentStartLinearWalk().
Starts linear walk for single channel. XMC_BCCU_StartLinearWalk().
Starts dimming for multiple dimming engines together. XMC_BCCU_ConcurrentStartDimming().
Starts dimming for single dimming engine. XMC_BCCU_StartDimming().

BCCU_CH features:
Configuration structure (XMC_BCCU_CH_t and initialization function XMC_BCCU_CH_Init()
Allows selecting dimming engine. XMC_BCCU_CH_SelectDimEngine().
Allows setting target channel intensity. XMC_BCCU_CH_SetTargetIntensity().
Allows knowing the status of linear walk completion. XMC_BCCU_IsLinearWalkComplete()
Allows setting flicker watchdog. XMC_BCCU_CH_EnableFlickerWatchdog().
Allows configuring packer settings. XMC_BCCU_CH_EnablePacker(), XMC_BCCU_CH_SetPackerThreshold(), XMC_BCCU_CH_SetPackerOffCompare(), XMC_BCCU_CH_SetPackerOffCounte(), XMC_BCCU_CH_SetPackerOnCounter()
Allows selecting dimming bypass. XMC_BCCU_CH_DisableDimmingBypass()

BCCU_DIM features:
Configuration structure (XMC_BCCU_DIM_t and initialization function XMC_BCCU_DIM_Init()
Allows setting target dimming engine intensity. XMC_BCCU_DIM_SetTargetDimmingLevel(). XMC_BCCU_DIM_SetTargetDimmingLevel
Allows knowing the status of dimming completion. XMC_BCCU_IsDimmingFinished()
Allows configuring dimming divider. XMC_BCCU_DIM_SetDimDivider()
Allows configuring dimming curve. XMC_BCCU_DIM_ConfigDimCurve()

listitem.para: Set output passive and active levels using XMC_BCCU_ConcurrentSetOutputPassiveLevel() or XMC_BCCU_SetOutputPassiveLevel()
Enable channels using XMC_BCCU_ConcurrentEnableChannels() or XMC_BCCU_EnableChannel()
Enable dimming engines using XMC_BCCU_ConcurrentEnableDimmingEngine() or XMC_BCCU_EnableDimmingEngine()
Configure channel linear walk prescaler using XMC_BCCU_CH_SetLinearWalkPrescaler()
Set target intensities of channels using XMC_BCCU_CH_SetTargetIntensity()
Set target dim levels of dimming engines using XMC_BCCU_DIM_SetTargetDimmingLevel()
Start linear walk of the channels using XMC_BCCU_ConcurrentStartLinearWalk() or XMC_BCCU_StartLinearWalk()
Start dimming of the dimming engines using XMC_BCCU_ConcurrentStartDimming() or XMC_BCCU_StartDimming()
Check the status of linear walk completion using XMC_BCCU_IsLinearWalkComplete()
Check the status of dimming completion XMC_BCCU_IsDimmingFinished()
